SEARCH
Package controller

Class StudentHandler

java.lang.Object
controller.StudentHandler
public class StudentHandler extends Object
Handler class for managing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on a list of students using a doubly linked list.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static StudentHandler getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the StudentHandler class. Uses double-checked locking to ensure thread safety.
      Returns:
      the single instance of StudentHandler

    • restartInstance

      public void restartInstance()
      Resets the singleton instance of the class to allow reinitialization. This method sets the current instance to null, enabling the re-creation of the instance if needed. This can be useful for testing purposes or when you need to reset the state of the singleton.

    • addStudent

      public boolean addStudent(String id, String name, String lastname, String email, EGender gender, String career)
      Adds a student to the list in a sorted order.
      Parameters:
      id - the student's code
      name - the student's name
      lastname - the student's last name
      email - the student's email
      gender - the student's gender
      career - the student's career
      Returns:
      true if the student was added successfully
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student or required fields are null, or if a student with the same ID already exists

    • addStudentFirst

      public boolean addStudentFirst(String id, String name, String lastname, String email, EGender gender, String career)
      Adds a student to the beginning of the list.
      Parameters:
      id - the student's code
      name - the student's name
      lastname - the student's last name
      email - the student's email
      gender - the student's gender
      career - the student's career
      Returns:
      true after successfully adding the student at the beginning
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is null or the ID is already in use

    • findStudentByCode

      public Student findStudentByCode(String code)
      Finds a student by their code.
      Parameters:
      code - the student's code
      Returns:
      the student with the given code, or null if not found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the code is null or empty

    • updateStudent

      public boolean updateStudent(String code, String name, String lastname, String email, EGender gender, String career)
      Updates a student's information.
      Parameters:
      code - the code of the student to update
      name - the updated student's name
      lastname - the updated student's last name
      email - the updated student's email
      gender - the updated student's gender
      career - the updated student's career
      Returns:
      true if the student was successfully updated
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the code is null, empty, or any of the updated fields are null
      IllegalStateException - if a student with the given code is not found

    • deleteStudent

      public boolean deleteStudent(String code)
      Deletes a student by their code.
      Parameters:
      code - the student's code
      Returns:
      true if the student was successfully deleted
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the code is null or empty
      IllegalStateException - if a student with the given code is not found

      Parameters:
      ascending - whether to list in ascending order
      Returns:
      a list of all students

      public boolean addStudentBefore(String code, String id, String name, String lastname, String email, EGender gender, String career)
      Adds a student before another student identified by a code.
      Parameters:
      code - the reference student's code
      id - the student's code to add
      name - the student's name to add
      lastname - the student's last name to add
      email - the student's email to add
      gender - the student's gender to add
      career - the student's career to add
      Returns:
      true if the student was added successfully
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is null or the ID is already in use

    • addStudentAfter

      public boolean addStudentAfter(String code, String id, String name, String lastname, String email, EGender gender, String career)

      Parameters:
      code - the reference student's code
      id - the student's code to add
      name - the student's name to add
      lastname - the student's last name to add
      email - the student's email to add
      gender - the student's gender to add
      career - the student's career to add
      Returns:
      true if the student was added successfully
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the student is null or the ID is already in use

    • getStudentByPosition

      public Student getStudentByPosition(int position)

      Returns:

      Throws:
